Press the left or right key to traverse the slideshow

You can also use the spacebar to navigate the slideshow

StrideShow is a client-mobile presentation tool

Download the mobile app

HIGHLY RECOMMENDED but optional: the app is a significant part of a stridshow presentation

The rest of this tutorial involves the mobile app

On the app, click the demo button

In the demo activity, enter this generated number into your mobile device and wait for the mobile panel on the right to indicate that your mobile device has connected

On your mobile device, you should now see the presentations. This presentation titled 'Instructions' should be highlighted green. Tap the presentation to control it through your phone. The mobile panel will tell you when you are connected

You can now swipe left and right on the app to traverse the slideshow. Continue viewing this on mobile

Switch to full screen

Try the laser pointer

Try the magnifying glass

That's it for this tutorial. Exit the slideshow and check out the other presentations in this demo
